name: Stick Thief
description:
Stick Thief is a point-and-click adventure game involving many different puzzles. It explores the journey of one thief who is on a quest to make the world a better place.

You will guide the man to accomplish daily missions to help the peoples. Find what they need and use the item in the correct places to win.

To obtain the needed items, you have to unlock the key first which is not so easy to do and to give the items you have to play some challenging mini games. Have fun!
